#summary Use case: 012 Remove link between SMD music entity and a metadata source
#labels Use-Case

=== Purpose ===
Remove a link between SMD music entity and a metadata source.

=== Actors ===
    * Library Maintainer

=== Description ===
Actor wants to remove an existing link between a music entity and an online data source. Actor first selects music entity. He is shown a list of existing links he could remove.
<br/>Result: the link is removed from SMD library

=== Additional Information ===
